title: Tesla
heading: Season 3, Episode 1
description:
Acquired kicks off Season 3 with a gangbuster two-hour extravaganza on America's most successful automotive startup since The Ford Motor Company: Tesla. We cover everything, from founding to its 2010 IPO to all that's happened since, including the question on the minds of superhero fans everywhere: who came first, Elon Musk or Tony Stark? (Spoiler: Elon)‚Äç
